DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact Wise Guys program delay sexual initiation adolescent male Eastern Iowa .
DOC.detailed_description: This study use randomize controlled design compare impact Wise Guys Program `` business-as-usual '' school curriculum . The Wise Guys multi-session curriculum deliver different format range length 5 12 week topic cover include communication masculinity , date violence , abstinence contraception , sexually transmitted infection . Study participants 7th grade boy attend participate school either Davenport Iowa North Scott Community school district . This study conduct part national Personal Responsibility Education Program evaluation fund Administration Children Families within U.S. Department Health Human Services .
